about_the_game:
ABOUT GAME


The main idea of Digital Cities is to explore the capitals and ordinary cities of the world, giving the user the opportunity to experience the atmosphere of new places and discover new corners of the planet with RolePlaying game mode. The open-world game allows users to choose a city where they can walk or ride on transportation, which will be available after obtaining the necessary resources by completing interesting tasks and quests.

Unleash Your Character’s Potential in this Exciting Game of Growth and Exploration!

Welcome to the world of Digital Cities, an addictive PC game where you can create your own unique character with Meta-Human and develop his skills. In Digital Cities, you have the power to enhance your character’s abilities, level up their skills, and unlock new opportunities. With each level, your character gains access to a wide range of options, such as purchasing transportation and real estate. The higher your character’s level, the greater the possibilities.

Embark on an Epic Journey in Digital Cities: Shape Your Character’s Destiny and Seize Limitless Opportunities!

Digital Cities offer a world of endless possibilities, where you can become a master of your own character. Progress, level up, and enjoy the boundless opportunities that the game has to offer.

Rise to the Top: Join Thrilling Tournaments in Digital Cities and Climb the Leaderboard to Claim Epic Rewards!

Participate in regular tournaments and competitions where you can compete against the best players in Digital Cities. The leaderboard will display the top performers who have achieved the highest results. Special rewards and prizes await the leaders!

Shape the Digital Economy: Player-Driven Dynamics in Digital Cities, from Services to Banking and Beyond!

In Digital Cities, the economy is player-driven, fostering a dynamic environment where services are provided by real players. From taxi rides and purchasing goods to real estate and transportation, the possibilities are endless. Engage in a fully functioning banking system, offering loans secured by in-game assets and opportunities for deposits.

movies.name: DICI Game, Welcome to Digital Cities World

name: Digital Cities

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 6gb or AMD Radeon RX 5700 8gb
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 120 GB available space

short_description: The main idea of project is to explore the capitals and ordinary cities of the world, giving the user the opportunity to get into the atmosphere of new places and discover new corners of the planet with the help of RolePlaying game mode. Up your skills, go to work, trade, travel, all in one game.
